editedFacts.rooms: Breakfast nook, Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Master bath, Mud room, Pantry, Recreation room, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription: Coming Soon. You will fall in love with this custom Tri Level masterpiece located right in the center of a cul de sac in Sierra Hills subdivision. This home includes all the bells and whistles you deserve. Refrigerated air, living room/dining room, upstairs loft, kitchen with new cabinets & granite countertops. Garage is converted for extra living space including built in surround sound & recess lighting perfect for those movie nights. Why convert the garage back when you can park under the detached car port that can fit over 6 vehicles and still have room for an RV. This prime lot provides a backyard that is excellent for entertaining featuring plenty of space, a covered patio, exterior fireplace, barbecue area, BONUS room equipped with it's own bathroom - use it as your Pool House, Game Room, In Law Quarters, Office, or Man Cave! You choose! You even get a cool exterior bathroom to use after/before a swim in the inground pool. Home is currently in the process of being remodeled. Get this home before it goes on the market at a special price! Appointment only. Special financing available.
response.whatOwnerLoves: Large Cul De Sac lot! Pool House! Theatre Room!
